title: HR Dashboard
description: Developed an interactive HR dashboard in Tableau to analyze hiring trends, workforce demographics, and salary patterns—applying analytical thinking to uncover insights that support strategic HR decisions.

title: Sales Dashboard
description: Built an interactive Tableau dashboard to analyze sales by region, category, and time. Features KPI summaries, trend lines, product analysis, and geographic maps — enabling business users to track performance and identify revenue opportunities.

title: Netflix Case Study
description: Conducted an exploratory data analysis using Python to uncover viewing trends across genres, release years, and user ratings—leveraging analytical thinking to identify patterns in Netflix's content strategy.

title: Aerofit
description: Analyzed Aerofit customer data to profile treadmill buyers using descriptive stats and probability. Identified patterns in usage, income, fitness, and demographics to support targeted product recommendations and data-driven marketing.

title: SQL Business Case Study
description: Analyzed retail sales data using advanced SQL queries to extract key performance metrics, identify customer patterns, and generate insights to inform data-driven marketing decisions.

title: Hospital Management
description: Built and queried a relational SQL database for hospital management, covering patients, staff, treatments, and billing. Analyzed demographics and department workloads to deliver insights that support efficient healthcare planning and resource allocation.

title: TATA-Forage
description: Performed exploratory data analysis on a financial dataset to support delinquency risk modeling. Handled missing data, created customer segments, and identified early risk indicators using credit behavior, income, and loan metrics.

title: Root Cause Analysis
description: Analyzed Uber ride data to identify peak-time supply-demand gaps using time-based EDA. Categorized trip statuses, built time-slot segments, and uncovered cancellation and no-availability trends — enabling actionable insights for better cab allocation.
